  • 2-Sign in
  • 3-Create new account
  • 4-Verify your new email address
  • 5-A new email address added to your account
  • 6-Invitation from {user_full_name} (@{user_username})
  • 7-Your {total_count} posts have been syncd
  • 8-Your {actor_service} account needs attention
  • 9-Welcome To The World of Awesomeness!
  • 10-Notification - {user_full_name} (@{user_username}) followed you
  • 11-Notification - {user_full_name} (@{user_username}) liked your post
  • 12-Notification - {user_full_name} (@{user_username}) commented - {comment_sm}
  • 13-Notification - {user_full_name} (@{user_username}) added {actor_service}
  • 14-Notification - @{user_username} added {actor_guest_service} to {guest_user_full_name} (@{guest_user_username})
  • 15-Notification - {user_full_name} (@{user_username}) joined {_app_name}
